responses.text: Cockpit, cabin and holds 1 and 2 only

questions.text: Hot air fault light illuminates on the air conditioning panel,

responses.text: The hot air press. reg. valve closes and the trim air valves close.
The hot air press. reg. valve opens and the trim air valves close.
The hot air press. reg. valve closes and the trim air valves open.
The hot air press. reg. valve opens and the trim air valves open.

questions.text: Does the trim air provide the warm air or the cold air to the air conditioning system?
In case of zone controller primary and secondary channel failure, what temperatures are maintained by pack one and pack two?

responses.text: 20 deg.C for pack one and 10 deg.C for pack two
24 deg.C for pack one and 15 deg.C for pack two

questions.text: In normal flight in closed circuit configuration, the avionics ventilation system controls the temperature of the cooling air by:

responses.text: Adding air conditioned air to the flow
Passing air through a skin heat exchanger

questions.text: To enable Ram air to the mixture unit  The Ram air switch should be used:

responses.text: Only when differential pressure is less than 1 psi.
When pressure is greater than 1 psi diff
Only after outflow valve is fully opened
No effect on pack regulation backup mode is lost
Pack outlet temperature is controlled at 15 deg.C'

questions.text: Pack controller, primary and secondary channel failure

responses.text: Pack outlet temperature is controlled to between 5 and 30 deg.C by the anti-ice valve
The packs deliver a fixed temperature of 20 deg.C

questions.text: Hot air press. reg. valve failed open:

responses.text: The temperature stays at the value selected
Cabin temperature will be controlled at the upper limit 30 deg.C

questions.text: Bleed air supplied from the APU (APU bleed valve open), the pack flow is automatically selected:?
